description: Styles for the Card component, defining appearance, layout, and responsive behavior.

classes.name: card
classes.description: Main styling class for the Card component, defining its layout, background, shadow, and interactivity.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the Card component.

classes.name: title
classes.description: Styling for the title text within the Card component.

classes.name: subtitle
classes.description: Styling for the subtitle text within the Card component.

classes.name: actions
classes.description: Styling for the action buttons or links within the Card component.

classes.name: media
classes.description: Styling for any media content (such as images) within the Card component.

classes.name: body
classes.description: Styling for the main content area within the Card component.

classes.name: footer
classes.description: Styling for the footer section of the Card component.
